title: Protein powder - whey isolate?
text: Hello, I had bariatric surgery (modified duodenal switch) on September 23rd 2025. The bariatric surgeon office is pushing their in house protein powder as the only acceptable option for protein shake intake. I know other protein powders exist that are whey isolate (that’s what they say it has to be vs a whey protein only). Can anyone explain if I’m safe to use other whey isolate protein powders? I feel like they’re just trying to push their brand for sales. Doesn’t feel good… thanks!
